reviewText: This is the funniest French and Saunders I've ever seen. Jennifer and Dawn are fabulous as usual. Jennifer's hubby, Ade, did a marvelous job directing. That's why i give this 5 stars in my book. For laughter, directing, and for just being such glamerous people.

Contrary to the above review, there was no such "kiss" in the video I ordered. Also, the film quality was not that great. That being said, French and Saunders always manage to create some funny sketches...but you can definitely tell this is their "formative" years as comidiennes.
